locations.name: Ravenhurst
locations.description: A foreboding, mist-shrouded settlement on the edge of a vast and treacherous forest.

locations.name: Zha'thik's Citadel
locations.description: A foreboding, ancient stronghold shrouded in perpetual twilight, said to be the remnants of a powerful sorcerer-king's seat of power.
services: Rumored treasure hidden within the citadel's depths

locations.name: Ravenhurst
locations.description: A small, isolated settlement on the edge of a dense forest, shrouded in perpetual twilight.

locations.name: Korvus' Peak
locations.description: A foreboding and snow-capped mountain range, shrouded in an eternal veil of mist and darkness. The air is crisp with the scent of decay and death.

factions.name: The Shadow Brotherhood
factions.ideology: Chaos and Anarchy through darkness and terror
goals: Establish a new order with themselves at the top

quests.title: The Shadows of Ravenhurst's Past
quests.description: Delve into the forgotten history of Ravenhurst and uncover the secrets that lie within its ancient walls.
objectives: Investigate strange occurrences in the abandoned wing of Ravenhurst Manor
Uncover a hidden diary belonging to the former lord of Ravenhurst
Confront the dark forces that have taken hold within the manor's depths

quests.title: Breaching the Spire of Shadows
quests.description: The dark forces have taken hold of Zha'thik's Citadel, and it is up to brave adventurers to put an end to their evil plans.
objectives: Retrieve a valuable artifact from the heart of the citadel
Eliminate the dark sorcerer controlling the forces within

quests.title: The Lost Oracle of Korvus'
quests.description: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the long-abandoned temple on Korvus' Peak, said to hold the secrets of the land.
objectives: Reach the top of Korvus' Peak without succumbing to the treacherous paths and unforgiving climate.
Locate and retrieve the Oracle's Chalice from the ancient temple.
Return the artifact to the village elder before nightfall.
